title: Nigeria 1960 - sunrise in the east
creator_credit: British Information Services, Victor M. Gover, Andre Libik and Eric Chamberlain
brief_description: A survey of eastern Nigeria against a background of Independence celebrations: the region and its people, natural resources and recent developments in industry, agriculture, transport, communications, health and education services.
